DavidMohrhardt.animator

Class Animator

  • java.lang.Object
    • DavidMohrhardt.animator.Animator

  • public class Animator
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    0.01 This is the animator package. This file is the Animator object. It handles the interface between the programmer and the sprite. It also builds the sprite and it's action set.
    Author:
    David Mohrhardt
